full_summary:
## Alarm System Replacement Design
### Project Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of Correctional Service Canada (CSC) invites proposals from qualified engineering firms for the replacement of the alarm system at the Parrtown Community Correctional Centre in Saint John, New Brunswick.

### Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Number:** WS4417343666
* **Publication Date:** January 31, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** February 13, 2024 02:00 p.m. AST
* **Procurement Category:** SRV
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Selective Tendering

### Service Requirements

The project involves the replacement of the alarm system at the Parrtown Community Correctional Centre. The scope of work includes design and installation of a new alarm system that meets the current standards and regulations.

### Qualified Firms

The following firms have been pre-qualified under the Electrical discipline for the province of New Brunswick and are invited to submit proposals:

* Strum Engineering Associates Ltd.
* Roy Consultants
* Dillon Consulting Limited
* Pageau Morel et associés inc.
* Englobe Corp.

### Proposal Submission and Evaluation

Proposals may be submitted in either English or French and should be addressed to the Contracting Authority as specified in the solicitation document. The proposal evaluation will be based on the selection criteria outlined in the solicitation document.

### Contact Information

For more information or to request a debriefing on the bid solicitation results, please contact:

* Nicole Fesseha (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: nicole.fesseha@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### North American Industry Classification System (NAICS)

* 81101508 – Architectural Engineering
* 81101701 – Electrical Engineering Services

### United Nations Development Group (UNDG)

* 81101508 – Architectural Engineering
* 81101701 – Electrical Engineering Services
